questions: How do I import sub-task for multiple tickets?
How do I create sub-task for multiple tickets to gather?
How do I combine sub-task creation?
How do I create issues under multiple projects?
answer: While importing issues, you can provide comma separated values for parent or project column, that way you would be able to generate sub-task for multiple tickets or create same issues under multiple projects. But you cannot use both the features together. Multiple values are allowed only in parent or in project field.
